firstNight.name: Dusk
firstNight.reminder: Start the Night Phase.

firstNight.name: Angel
firstNight.reminder: Announce which players are protected by the Angel. Add the PROTECTED token to the relevant players.

firstNight.name: Buddhist
firstNight.reminder: Declare which players are affected by the Buddhist.

firstNight.name: Toymaker
firstNight.reminder: Resolve the Minion Info and Demon Info steps even though there are fewer than 7 players.

firstNight.name: Wraith
firstNight.reminder: Wake the Wraith whenever other evil players wake.

firstNight.name: Lord of Typhon
firstNight.reminder: Replace neighbors of the Lord of Typhon with Minions, wake them, tell them their new alignment and character, then do minion info.

firstNight.name: Kazali
firstNight.reminder: Wake the Kazali, allow them to choose Minions.

firstNight.name: Barista
firstNight.reminder: Choose a player, wake them and tell them which Barista power is affecting them. Treat them accordingly (sober/healthy/true info or activate their ability twice).

firstNight.name: Bureaucrat
firstNight.reminder: The Bureaucrat chooses a player.

firstNight.name: Thief
firstNight.reminder: The Thief chooses a player.

firstNight.name: Boffin
firstNight.reminder: Wake the Boffin and the Demon. Show the not-in-play good character token. Put the Boffin and the Demon to sleep.

firstNight.name: Philosopher
firstNight.reminder: The Philosopher might choose a character. If necessary, swap their character token.

firstNight.name: Alchemist
firstNight.reminder: Show the YOU ARE token and the character token of a Minion.

firstNight.name: Poppy Grower
firstNight.reminder: Do not do the Minion Info and Demon Info steps. Wake the Demon, show the THESE CHARACTERS ARE NOT IN PLAY info token and any three good character tokens that are not in play.
tokens: THESE CHARACTERS ARE NOT IN PLAY

firstNight.name: Yaggababble
firstNight.reminder: Choose a secret phrase. Wake the Yaggababble and let them know their secret phrase.

firstNight.name: Magician
firstNight.reminder: Include the Magician in the Minion and Demon Info steps.

firstNight.name: Snitch
firstNight.reminder: Wake each Minion. Show the THESE CHARACTERS ARE NOT IN PLAY token and three not-in-play character tokens. Put each Minion to sleep.
tokens: THESE CHARACTERS ARE NOT IN PLAY

firstNight.name: Summoner
firstNight.reminder: Show the THESE CHARACTERS ARE NOT IN PLAY token. Show 3 not-in-play good character tokens.
tokens: THESE CHARACTERS ARE NOT IN PLAY

firstNight.name: King
firstNight.reminder: Wake the Demon. Show the THIS PLAYER IS token and the King token, then point to the King.

firstNight.name: Sailor
firstNight.reminder: The Sailor chooses a living player.

firstNight.name: Lil' Monsta
firstNight.reminder: Wake all Minions, allow them to choose a babysitter.

firstNight.name: Lleech
firstNight.reminder: The Lleech chooses a player.

firstNight.name: Poisoner
firstNight.reminder: The Poisoner chooses a player.

firstNight.name: Widow
firstNight.reminder: Show the Grimoire for as long as the Widow needs. The Widow chooses a player.

firstNight.name: Wizard
firstNight.reminder: Run the Wizard's ability, if applicable.

firstNight.name: Godfather
firstNight.reminder: Show the character tokens of all in-play Outsiders.

firstNight.name: Organ Grinder
firstNight.reminder: The Organ Grinder either nods their head yes to be drunk, or shakes their head no to be sober.

firstNight.name: Devil's Advocate
firstNight.reminder: The Devil's Advocate chooses a living player.

firstNight.name: Evil Twin
firstNight.reminder: Wake both twins. Allow eye contact. Show the good twin's character token to the Evil Twin & vice versa.

firstNight.name: Witch
firstNight.reminder: The Witch chooses a player.

firstNight.name: Fearmonger
firstNight.reminder: The Fearmonger chooses a player.  Declare that "the Fearmonger has chosen a player."

firstNight.name: Mezepheles
firstNight.reminder: Show the written word.

firstNight.name: Pukka
firstNight.reminder: The Pukka chooses a player.

firstNight.name: Pixie
firstNight.reminder: Show the Townsfolk character token marked MAD.

firstNight.name: Damsel
firstNight.reminder: If the Damsel was chosen by the Huntsman, show them the YOU ARE info token and their new character token.

firstNight.name: Amnesiac
firstNight.reminder: Run the Amnesiac's ability, if applicable.

firstNight.name: Chef
firstNight.reminder: Give a finger signal.

firstNight.name: Empath
firstNight.reminder: Give a finger signal.

firstNight.name: Fortune Teller
firstNight.reminder: The Fortune Teller chooses 2 players. Nod if either is the Demon (or the RED HERRING).

firstNight.name: Butler
firstNight.reminder: The Butler chooses a player.

firstNight.name: Grandmother
firstNight.reminder: Point to the grandchild player & show their character token.

firstNight.name: Clockmaker
firstNight.reminder: Give a finger signal.

firstNight.name: Dreamer
firstNight.reminder: The Dreamer points to a player. Show 1 good & 1 evil character token, 1 of which is their character.

firstNight.name: Seamstress
firstNight.reminder: The Seamstress might choose 2 players. Nod or shake your head.

firstNight.name: Steward
firstNight.reminder: Point to the good player marked KNOW.

firstNight.name: Knight
firstNight.reminder: Point to the two non-Demon players marked KNOW.

firstNight.name: Noble
firstNight.reminder: Point to all three players marked KNOW.

firstNight.name: Balloonist
firstNight.reminder: Show any player.

firstNight.name: Shugenja
firstNight.reminder: Point clockwise or anticlockwise around the circle.

firstNight.name: Village Idiot
firstNight.reminder: Choose a Village Idiot to be drunk. Wake the Village Idiots one at a time, they choose a player, show either good or evil thumbs according to the alignment of that player.

firstNight.name: Bounty Hunter
firstNight.reminder: Point to the KNOWN player.

firstNight.name: Cult Leader
firstNight.reminder: The Cult Leader might change alignment. If so, show the YOU ARE info token and a thumbs up or down for their new alignment.

firstNight.name: Spy
firstNight.reminder: Show the Grimoire for as long as the Spy needs.

firstNight.name: Ogre
firstNight.reminder: The Ogre points to a player.

firstNight.name: High Priestess
firstNight.reminder: Point to a player.

firstNight.name: General
firstNight.reminder: Give a thumb signal.

firstNight.name: Chambermaid
firstNight.reminder: The Chambermaid chooses 2 living players. Give a finger signal.

firstNight.name: Mathematician
firstNight.reminder: Give a finger signal.

firstNight.name: Dawn
firstNight.reminder: Wait for a few seconds. End the Night Phase.

firstNight.name: Vizier
firstNight.reminder: Announce the Vizier player to the group.

firstNight.name: Dusk
firstNight.reminder: Start the Night Phase.

firstNight.name: Toymaker
firstNight.reminder: If it is a night when a Demon attack could end the game, and the Demon is marked FINAL NIGHT: NO ATTACK, then the Demon does not act tonight. (Do not wake them.)

firstNight.name: Wraith
firstNight.reminder: Wake the Wraith whenever other evil players wake.

firstNight.name: Philosopher
firstNight.reminder: The Philosopher might choose a character. If necessary, swap their character token.

firstNight.name: Sailor
firstNight.reminder: The Sailor chooses a living player.

firstNight.name: Poisoner
firstNight.reminder: The Poisoner chooses a player.

firstNight.name: Wizard
firstNight.reminder: Run the Wizard's ability, if applicable.

firstNight.name: Gambler
firstNight.reminder: The Gambler chooses a player & a character.

firstNight.name: Acrobat
firstNight.reminder: The Acrobat chooses a player.

firstNight.name: Monk
firstNight.reminder: The Monk chooses a player.

firstNight.name: Organ Grinder
firstNight.reminder: The Organ Grinder either nods their head yes to be drunk, or shakes their head no to be sober.

firstNight.name: Devil's Advocate
firstNight.reminder: The Devil's Advocate chooses a living player.

firstNight.name: Witch
firstNight.reminder: The Witch chooses a player.

firstNight.name: Pit-Hag
firstNight.reminder: The Pit-Hag chooses a player & a character. If they chose a character that is not in play: Put the Pit-Hag to sleep. Wake the target. Show the YOU ARE token & their new character token.

firstNight.name: Scarlet Woman
firstNight.reminder: If the Scarlet Woman became the Demon today, show them the YOU ARE token, then the Demon token.

firstNight.name: Summoner
firstNight.reminder: Change the Summoner reminder token to the relevant night. If it is night 3, the Summoner chooses a player and a Demon. Put the Summoner to sleep. Wake the chosen player. Show the YOU ARE token, a thumbs down and the chosen Demon token.

firstNight.name: Lunatic
firstNight.reminder: Do whatever needs to be done to simulate the Demon acting. Put the Lunatic to sleep. Wake the Demon. Show the Lunatic token & point to them, then their target(s).

firstNight.name: Lycanthrope
firstNight.reminder: The Lycanthrope chooses a player.

firstNight.name: Princess
firstNight.reminder: If the Princess nominated the player who was executed today, the Demon wakes as normal, but no one dies to the Demon's ability.

firstNight.name: Legion
firstNight.reminder: A player might die.

firstNight.name: Zombuul
firstNight.reminder: If no one died today, the Zombuul chooses a player.

firstNight.name: No Dashii
firstNight.reminder: The No Dashii chooses a player.

firstNight.name: Vortox
firstNight.reminder: The Vortox chooses a player.

firstNight.name: Lord of Typhon
firstNight.reminder: The Lord of Typhon chooses a player.

firstNight.name: Ojo
firstNight.reminder: The Ojo chooses a character.

firstNight.name: Lleech
firstNight.reminder: The Lleech chooses a player.

firstNight.name: Yaggababble
firstNight.reminder: For each time the Yaggababble said the phrase today, you may choose a player. They die.

firstNight.name: Kazali
firstNight.reminder: The Kazali chooses a player.

firstNight.name: Godfather
firstNight.reminder: If an Outsider died today, the Godfather chooses a player.

firstNight.name: Gossip
firstNight.reminder: If the Gossip is due to kill a player, they die.

firstNight.name: Hatter
firstNight.reminder: If the Hatter died today or tonight, wake Minions and Demons, allow them to choose new characters.

firstNight.name: Sweetheart
firstNight.reminder: If the Sweetheart died, a player became drunk immediately. If you haven't done this yet, do so now.

firstNight.name: Plague Doctor
firstNight.reminder: If the Plague Doctor died, the Storyteller gained a Minion ability. If you haven’t done this yet, do so now.

firstNight.name: Sage
firstNight.reminder: If the Demon killed the Sage, wake the Sage and point to 2 players, 1 of which is the Demon.

firstNight.name: Banshee
firstNight.reminder: If the Banshee was killed by the Demon tonight, announce to all players that the Banshee has died.

firstNight.name: Choirboy
firstNight.reminder: If the Demon killed the King, point to the Demon player.

firstNight.name: Damsel
firstNight.reminder: If the Damsel was chosen by the Huntsman, show them the YOU ARE info token and their new character token.

firstNight.name: Amnesiac
firstNight.reminder: Run the Amnesiac's ability, if applicable.

firstNight.name: Farmer
firstNight.reminder: If the Farmer died tonight, wake an alive good player. Show them the YOU ARE info token and a Farmer character token. Replace their previous token with the Farmer token.

firstNight.name: Tinker
firstNight.reminder: The Tinker might die.

firstNight.name: Moonchild
firstNight.reminder: If the Moonchild is due to kill a good player, they die.

firstNight.name: Grandmother
firstNight.reminder: If the grandchild was killed by the Demon, the Grandmother dies too.

firstNight.name: Tor
firstNight.reminder: If a player died tonight, show the YOU ARE info token, their character token, & a thumbs up or thumbs down.

firstNight.name: Ravenkeeper
firstNight.reminder: If the Ravenkeeper died tonight, the Ravenkeeper chooses a player. Show that player's character token.

firstNight.name: Empath
firstNight.reminder: Give a finger signal.

firstNight.name: Fortune Teller
firstNight.reminder: The Fortune Teller chooses 2 players. Nod if either is the Demon (or the RED HERRING).

firstNight.name: Undertaker
firstNight.reminder: If a player was executed today, show their character token.

firstNight.name: Dreamer
firstNight.reminder: The Dreamer points to a player. Show 1 good & 1 evil character token, 1 of which is their character.

firstNight.name: Flowergirl
firstNight.reminder: Either nod or shake your head.

firstNight.name: Town Crier
firstNight.reminder: Either nod or shake your head.

firstNight.name: Oracle
firstNight.reminder: Give a finger signal.

firstNight.name: Seamstress
firstNight.reminder: The Seamstress might choose 2 players. Nod or shake your head.

firstNight.name: Juggler
firstNight.reminder: Give a finger signal.

firstNight.name: Balloonist
firstNight.reminder: Show a player with a different character type to previously.

firstNight.name: Village Idiot
firstNight.reminder: Wake the Village Idiots one at a time, they choose a player, show either good or evil thumbs according to the alignment of that player.

firstNight.name: King
firstNight.reminder: If the dead equal or outnumber the living, show the character token of an alive player.

firstNight.name: Cult Leader
firstNight.reminder: The Cult Leader might change alignment. If so, show the YOU ARE info token and a thumbs up or down for their new alignment.

firstNight.name: Butler
firstNight.reminder: The Butler chooses a player.

firstNight.name: Spy
firstNight.reminder: Show the Grimoire for as long as the Spy needs.

firstNight.name: High Priestess
firstNight.reminder: Point to a player.

firstNight.name: General
firstNight.reminder: Give a thumb signal.

firstNight.name: Chambermaid
firstNight.reminder: The Chambermaid chooses 2 living players. Give a finger signal.

firstNight.name: Mathematician
firstNight.reminder: Give a finger signal.

firstNight.name: Dawn
firstNight.reminder: Wait for a few seconds. End the Night Phase.

firstNight.name: Leviathan
firstNight.reminder: Optionally, declare that "The Leviathan is in play." Replace the reminder token.
